mainSequence.step: Receptionist requests to view the dashboard
DashboardRouter directs the request to get dashboard data
DashboardController executes method to retrieve dashboard data
DashboardModel queries database to acquire dashboard information
Database sends dashboard data to DashboardModel
DashboardModel sends dashboard data to DashboardRepository
DashboardRepository returns the dashboard data to DashboardController
DashboardController sends the extracted dashboard data
DashboardRouter sends back 200 OK status with dashboard data
UI receives correct response with dashboard data
Dashboard data is displayed to the Receptionist
